HelpTooltip: Extracts and Outputs a Vectors. The displayed data is either the live value when a Vector4 is connected to the input port, or when nothing is connected the display shows an editable field to output a Vector4

tips: x value: turn on/off using the toggle, flashes when detecting input
y value: turn on/off using the toggle, flashes when detecting input
z value: turn on/off using the toggle, flashes when detecting input
w value: turn on/off using the toggle, flashes when detecting input
